text:
@WhiteHouse Lies from pos, pathological liar corrupt criminal #donaldtrump about the #WHO... He is projecting...trump is one who has mismanaged & cover-up the handling of #CoronavirusPandemic in America. trump is deflecting from his failure...no doubt, the dirtbag has no decency.
#TrumpIsPos
